entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 24 this evening then steady.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this evening. Temperature rising to minus 24 this evening then steady. Wind chill minus 44 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 29 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light late in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 29 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 41. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Sunday 05 March 2023
